"2024-06-30", desktop: 446, mobile: 400 }, ] const chartConfig = { visitors: { label: "Visitors", }, desktop: { label: "Desktop", color: "var(--primary)", }, mobile: { label: "Mobile", color: "var(--primary)", }, } satisfies ChartConfig export function ChartAreaInteractive() { const isMobile = useIsMobile() const [timeRange, setTimeRange] = React.useState("90d") React.useEffect(() => { if (isMobile) { setTimeRange("7d") } }, [isMobile]) const filteredData = chartData.filter((item) => { const date = new Date(item.date) const referenceDate = new Date("2024-06-30") let daysToSubtract = 90 if (timeRange === "30d") { daysToSubtract = 30 } else if (timeRange === "7d") { daysToSubtract = 7 } const startDate = new Date(referenceDate) startDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() - daysToSubtract) return date >= startDate }) return ( Total Visitors Total for the last 3 months Last 3 months Last 3 months Last 30 days Last 7 days { const date = new Date(value) return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "short", day: "numeric", }) }} /> { return new Date(value).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "short", day: "numeric", }) }} indicator="dot" /> } /> ) }
